name: fusionbridge
description: Atomic cross-chain bridge enabling 1inch Fusion+ swaps between Ethereum and Aptos

scripts.build: npm run build:contracts && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:contracts: npm run build:ethereum && npm run build:aptos
scripts.test: npm run test:ethereum && npm run test:aptos
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:ethereum && npm run deploy:aptos
